description: SCADA system lost communication with 12 substations in northeast grid. Operators flying blind on load balancing.
Wind farm turbine management system showing erratic readings. 23 turbines reporting impossible wind speeds.
Natural gas pipeline pressure sensors offline along 40-mile segment. Manual readings required until restored.
Customer billing system calculated negative charges for 12,000 accounts. Bills already sent to print vendor.
Grid frequency deviation alert triggered. Automatic load shedding may activate if not stabilized within 10 minutes.
Smart meter data collection failed for overnight batch. 2.1 million meters missing consumption data.
Outage management system map display showing incorrect restoration times. Customer-facing app affected.
Solar farm inverters firmware update failed mid-deployment. 30% of inverters in safe mode producing no power.
Trading desk lost access to ISO real-time pricing data. Unable to optimize dispatch for economic signals.
Physical security system at nuclear facility reporting camera failures in restricted zone. NRC notification may be required.
